adGroupId.description: The identifier of a valid ad group.
adGroupId.name: adGroupId

adGroupIdFilter.description: Restricts results to keywords associated with ad groups specified by identifier in the comma-delimited list.
adGroupIdFilter.name: adGroupIdFilter

adIdFilter.description: Restricts results to product ads associated with the product ad identifiers specified in the comma-delimited list.
adIdFilter.name: adIdFilter

adStateFilter.description: Filters results to ad groups with state matching the comma-delimited list.
adStateFilter.name: adStateFilter

campaignIdFilter.description: A comma-delimited list of campaign identifiers.
campaignIdFilter.name: campaignIdFilter

campaignType.description: Restricts results to ad groups within campaign types specified in comma-separated list.
campaignType.name: campaignType

clientHeader.description: The identifier of a client associated with a "Login with Amazon" developer account.
clientHeader.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-ClientId

count.description: Number of records to include in the paged response. Defaults to max page size of 5000.
count.name: count

keywordIdFilter.description: Restricts results to keywords associated with campaigns specified by identifier in the comma-delimited list.
keywordIdFilter.name: keywordIdFilter

keywordText.description: Restricts results to keywords that match the specified text exactly.
keywordText.name: keywordText

locale.description: Restricts results to keywords associated with locale.
locale.name: locale

matchTypeFilter.description: Restricts results to keywords with match types within the specified comma-separated list. For more information, see [match types](https://advertising.amazon.com/help#GHTRFDZRJPW6764R) in the Amazon Ads support center.
matchTypeFilter.name: matchTypeFilter

maxNumSuggestions.description: The maximum number of suggested keywords for the response.
maxNumSuggestions.name: maxNumSuggestions

name.description: Restricts results to campaigns with the specified name.
name.name: name

negativeAdGroupIdFilter.description: Restricts results to negative keywords associated with ad groups specified by identifier in the comma-delimited list.
negativeAdGroupIdFilter.name: adGroupIdFilter

negativeCampaignIdFilter.description: Restricts results to negative keywords associated with campaigns specified by identifier in the comma-delimited list.
negativeCampaignIdFilter.name: campaignIdFilter

negativeKeywordIdFilter.description: Restricts results to negative keywords associated with campaigns specified by identifier in the comma-delimited list.
negativeKeywordIdFilter.name: keywordIdFilter

negativeKeywordText.description: Restricts results to negative keywords that match the specified text.
negativeKeywordText.name: keywordText

negativeMatchTypeFilter.description: Restricts results to negative keywords with match types within the specified comma-separated list. For more information, see [match types](https://advertising.amazon.com/help#GHTRFDZRJPW6764R) in the Amazon Ads support center.
negativeMatchTypeFilter.name: matchTypeFilter

negativeStateFilter.description: Restricts results to negative resources with state within the specified comma-separated list. Default includes all.
negativeStateFilter.name: stateFilter

portfolioIdFilter.description: A comma-delimited list of portfolio identifiers.
portfolioIdFilter.name: portfolioIdFilter

profileHeader.description: The identifier of a profile associated with the advertiser account. Use `GET` method on Profiles resource to list profiles associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header.
profileHeader.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-Scope

startIndex.description: 0-indexed record offset for the result set.
startIndex.name: startIndex

stateFilter.description: Restricts results to resources with state within the specified comma-separated list.
stateFilter.name: stateFilter

targetIdFilter.description: A comma-delimited list of target identifiers.
targetIdFilter.name: targetIdFilter

InvalidQueryParam.description: One or more query parameters contained an invalid value.

NotAcceptable.description: One or more values specified for a parameter was not within the specified acceptable range.

NotFound.description: The requested resource was not found.

ResourceNotFound.description: The requested resource was not found.

adGroupId.description: The identifier of the ad group.

bid.description: The suggested bid for the suggested keyword. Note that this field will not be included in the response if the `suggestBids` query parameter is set to `no` in the request.

state.description: The state of the ad for which the keyword is suggested.

adGroupId.description: The identifier of the ad group that the recommendations are associated with.

recommendations.description: An array of bid recommendation objects.

code.description: An enumerated error for machine use.

details.description: A human-readable description of the error.

asin.description: The ASIN for which keywords are suggested.

adGroupId.description: The identifier of the ad group that the keywords are associated with.

keywords.description: An array of keyword data objects.

adGroupId.description: The identifier of the ad group that the bid is associated with.

keywordId.description: The identifier of the keyword that the bid is associated with.

MatchType.description: The type of match. For more information, see [match types](https://advertising.amazon.com/help#GHTRFDZRJPW6764R) in the Amazon Ads support center.

recordType.description: The record type of the report.

status.description: The generation status of the snapshot.

type.description:
The type of targeting expression. You can specify values for the following predicates:
| Predicate | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `asinCategorySameAs` | Negatively Target the same category as the cat...

get.summary: Gets a bid recommendation for an ad group. [PLANNED DEPRECATION 3/27/2024]
Gets suggested keywords for the specified ad group.

parameters.description: Set to `yes` to include a suggest bid for the suggested keyword in the response. Otherwise, set to `no`.
parameters.name: suggestBids

get.summary: Gets suggested keywords with extended data for the specified ad group.

post.description: Suggested keywords are returned in an array ordered by descending effectiveness.

maxNumSuggestions.description: The maximum number of suggested keywords in the response.

post.summary: Gets suggested keyword for a specified list of ASINs.

get.description: Suggested keywords are returned in an array ordered by descending effectiveness.
get.summary: Gets suggested keywords for the specified ASIN.

requestBody.description: An array of keyword bid recommendation objects.

requestBody.description: An ad group identifier and list of associated targeting expressions for which to generate bid recommendations. Note that targeting expressions are required to be of the same type. That is, all targeting expressions in the list must be one of **keyword**, **product**, or **auto** target types.

recommendations.description: The list of recommended bids with associated targeting expressions.

post.summary: Gets a list of bid recommendations for keyword, product, or auto targeting expressions.

post.description: **Note: Snapshots APIs are deprecated and will be shut off on October 15, 2024. For replacement functionality, see the [exports](guides/exports/overview) API.
